donuts.name: cake
donuts.descript: Smaller in size but not in taste! This donut resembles the texture of cake, with a soft, moist interior.

donuts.name: glaze
donuts.descript: The CLASSIC donut. The dough is given plently of time to rise to create the soft and chewy texture that everybody loves!

donuts.name: old fashion
donuts.descript: This donut has a slightly crunchy exterior but is also cakey and soft on the inside!

donuts.name: twist
donuts.descript: This beautiful donut is twisted by hand then dipped in chocolate, covered in glaze, or tossed in sugar.

donuts.name: devilfood cake
donuts.descript: A subtle chocolatey cake donut with a slightly crunchy exterior and a soft, cake-like interior.

donuts.name: jelly-filled
donuts.descript: A delicious donut filled with a sweet yet tangy raspberry jelly and covered with glaze or tossed in powdered sugar.

donuts.name: buttermilk bar
donuts.descript: This cake-like donut is moist with a delicious buttermilk flavor!

donuts.name: chocolate bar
donuts.descript: The classic donut but long, slightly crunchier, and dipped in chocolate!

donuts.name: donut holes
donuts.descript: The CLASSIC glazed donut but bite sized!

donuts.name: bear claw
donuts.descript: A yeast donut shaped into a bear claw with apple pie-style filling!

donuts.name: apple fritter
donuts.descript: Juicy apples diced with donut dough and fried to perfection!

donuts.name: tiger tail
donuts.descript: A yeast and chocolate twist donut drizzled in glaze!

donuts.name: cinnamon roll
donuts.descript: A beautiful swirl of cinnamon and glaze with a soft and chewy texture.

donuts.name: chocolate chip bar
donuts.descript: Chocolate chips inside of a donut bar dipped in chocolate with chocolate chips sprinkled on top!

croissants.name: plain
croissants.descript: A flakey, buttery croissant pulled apart to reveal a fluffy inside!

croissants.name: raisin roll
croissants.descript: A wonderful swirl of cinnamon and raisins baked into a flakey croissant.

croissants.name: cream cheese
croissants.descript: Smooth, velvety cream cheese in a delicious croissant!

croissants.name: strawberry
croissants.descript: Sweet and tangy strawberries baked into a warm croissant!

croissants.name: blueberry
croissants.descript: Delicious blueberries baked into a croissant!

croissants.name: chocolate chip
croissants.descript: Sweet chocolate chips wrapped in a cozy croissant!

croissants.name: ham & cheese
croissants.descript: Juicy ham and american-swiss cheese rolled into a beautiful croissant!

muffins.name: blueberry muffin
muffins.descript: Blueberries baked into a warm, cozy muffin!

muffins.name: bran muffin
muffins.descript: A healthy bran muffin that tastes like dessert!

muffins.name: banana muffin
muffins.descript: Sweet, ripe bananas baked into a moist, cake-like muffin!

muffins.name: bagel & cream cheese
muffins.descript: The classic bagel wonderously toasted with a cream cheese spread!

drinks.name: coffee
drinks.descript: Freshly brewed coffee poured just for you!

drinks.name: flavored coffee
drinks.descript: Choose between hazelnut or french vanilla fresh coffee!

drinks.name: ice coffee
drinks.descript: Freshly brewed coffee with milk or cream in ice!

drinks.name: hot tea
drinks.descript: Any flavored tea brewed into a hot, cozy drink to sip!

drinks.name: hot chocolate
drinks.descript: Warm, soothing hot chocolate to help you relax!

drinks.name: orange juice
drinks.descript: Refreshing orange juice with vitamin D!
